availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Hillman (Kenton County, KY, and Hamilton County, Ohio, resident and private (USA))

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, and Hamilton County, Ohio, resident and soldier. Served in the 1st Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as a private and corporal from June 4, 1861, to February 14, 1862. Reported as deserted from Louisville, Kentucky, on February 14, 1862. Reported as living in Cincinnati, Ohio, in 1862.

ab.bibl: Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 156.
